title: Plain sailing: Boating holidays on the rise across the UK
description: More people are hiring boats to travel along the UK's canals and rivers amid travel restrictions.

description: The Ever Given arrived at Felixstowe on Tuesday and is expected to leave on Thursday.

title: England v India: Zak Crawley given caught behind after tentative Virat Kohli review

description: Katarina Johnson-Thompson's medal hopes in the Olympic women's heptathlon are effectively ended as she pulls up injured in the 200m.

description: British heptathlete Katarina Johnson-Thompson pulls up injured in the 200m but manages to compose herself to finish the race.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Laura Muir secures place in Friday's 1500m final
description: Britain's Laura Muir was seventh fastest into Friday's 1500m final as the Scot continued her quest for a first major medal at Tokyo 2020.

title: Villa sign Jamaica winger Bailey from Bayer Leverkusen
description: Aston Villa sign winger Leon Bailey for £25m from Bayer Leverkusen and bring him in on a deal until 2025.

title: MP Maria Miller wants AI 'nudifying' tool banned
description: A website that allows people to undress a photograph in seconds is gaining lots of users.

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB's Ben Whittaker says he doesn't want to look like a 'spoiled brat' after winning Olympic silver
